name: Fuzecat
description: Choose your favorite character among 12 rocket-cats with different powers, and happily slay your friends ! Up to 4 local players on the same screen (playable with keyboard, mouse and gamepad).
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (32bit or 64bit), Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: intel Core i3 2330M 2.20GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 630M Storage: 600 MB available space
